title: WUT and MSWIA collaborate on EBUS Object Detection
description: We are collaborating with the MSWIA to develop a lymphatic nodes detection and classifcation model for the EBUS diagnostic technique.
detailed_description: We are developing a lymphatic nodes detection and classifcation model for the EBUS diagnostic technique. The model is based on a deep learning architecture and is trained on a large dataset of EBUS images.
